name: h3
description: The Axe Strato 2 Flared Knob BBCOR Baseball Bat is designed for power hitters seeking unmatched performance and precision. With its end-loaded swing feel and a 2 5/8 inch barrel diameter, this bat delivers a formidable punch, while the hybrid construction combines an alloy barrel with a composite handle for optimal durability and power. The innovative Endogrid Technology minimizes hand vibrations, ensuring a comfortable grip and swing, while the flared knob shape enhances swing freedom for peak performance. Engineered with Armor Alloy Ultra Barrel and CNC Precision Variable Engineering, this bat boasts a thin yet incredibly strong sweet spot, complemented by the Composite Hyperwhip 2 Endcap that reduces weight for faster, more efficient swings. Approved for BBCOR play, it's the perfect choice for high school and college athletes aiming to elevate their game. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included.
